name: 1502 - Aniversario 10 - Toro
additionalNotes: The year, Enrique Sanchez’s Global Premium Cigars (and 1502 brand) celebrated its tenth anniversary. To commemorate the occasion, Sanchez has launched the 1502 Aniversario 10. It’s a cigar that was showcased at the 2022 Premium Cigar Association (PCA) Trade Show. It is also a cigar that had a soft launch on the eve of the Trade Show at a launch event at En Fuego in Las Vegas, Nevada.
